fullplot: Four women have given up on getting their men to do what they want until they find a how to book written by Steve Harvey. They start using his advice about relationships, and their men start falling in line, until the men discover what the women have been doing, then the war is on.
plot: Four friends conspire to turn the tables on their women when they discover the ladies have been using Steve Harvey's relationship advice against them.
title: Think Like a Man
